name: Barbell
description: a long bar with weights on each end, used for weightlifting exercises such as squats, deadlifts, and bench presses. Gym plates can be added or removed from the bar to adjust the weight being lifted. Barbells come in various lengths and weights, with standard and Olympic sizes being the most common

name: Dumbbells
description: handheld weights for strength training exercises such as bicep curls and shoulder presses

name: Kettlebells
description: cast iron weights with a handle that can be used for a variety of strength and cardio exercises

name: Gym plates
description: round weights used for strength training exercises, typically with a hole in the center to fit on a barbell. They come in various weights and are used to increase the resistance of weightlifting exercises, such as squats and deadlifts.

name: Medicine Balls
description: weighted balls used for functional strength and cardio exercises.

name: Punching Bag
description: a heavy bag used for boxing and martial arts training, hanging from the ceiling or a stand.

name: Treadmills
description: motorized running machines used for cardio exercise.

name: Ropes
description: thick ropes used for various exercises, such as battle ropes for full-body strength and cardio training, and jump ropes for cardiovascular exercise.

name: Jump Ropes
description: handheld ropes used for jumping rope, a cardiovascular exercise.

name: Yoga Mats
description: thin mats used for cushioning during yoga and other floor exercises.

name: Ellipticals
description: stationary machines used for low-impact cardio workouts
